title: Machine Learning Engineer & Researcher
description: Develop and refine deep learning models for spinal stenosis classification, muscle activity analysis, and soft tissue segmentation (muscles, nerves) as part of the ML.Spine project, utilizing state-of-the-art AI techniques and classical machine learning approaches
Integrate advanced visualization tools to present segmentation and classification results to clinical experts, improving interpretability and facilitating medical decision-making

title: ERP Systems Administrator & SQL Developer
description: Analyzed and integrated APIs from 5+ companies to develop custom solutions for e-commerce platforms, leading to a ~8% increase in customer engagement through enhanced product offerings
Developed and optimized ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes for Metabase, enhancing data accuracy
Leveraged PostgreSQL data to identify trending products for over 12 clients, streamlining inventory management and reducing stockouts by ~15%, contributing to a ~18% increase in sales efficiency.
Created dynamic and insightful data visualizations using BI tools, empowering teams to track key metrics and uncover business trends, leading to a ~11% improvement in operational decision-making.
Provided strategic consulting to e-commerce clients, optimizing store operations and contributing to improved sales performance.

title: Mobile Application Developer (Erasmus+ Intern)
description: Developed and deployed Android mobile applications using Java and Android Studio, following object-oriented programming (OOP) principles to create scalable and maintainable code
Designed a tourist places app with an integrated interactive map and API functionality, allowing users to explore nearby tourist destinations with detailed information
Implemented essential features such as user authentication, data storage with SQLite, and a dynamic user interface, which improved the overall user experience and functionality of the app

title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and QA specialists, to design and implement RESTful APIs and user interfaces for over 5 event websites and company pages in Bydgoszcz, ensuring seamless integration and a 10% improvement in user interaction

Spearheaded the development and maintenance of both front-end and back-end features, leveraging JavaScript, Node.js, Express, and React to build dynamic, responsive applications that improved user experience and system performance
Implemented an efficient content management system (CMS), allowing event organizers and business owners to update their sites independently, improving workflow and reducing update times by ~30%

title: Graphic Designer Intern
description: Developed a strong understanding of color management and layout for print, ensuring consistency across all deliverables and contributing to a 10% increase in client satisfaction
Assisted in automating the design processing workflow, streamlining file handling and approval stages, which improved overall efficiency and reduced processing time by 10%
Created vector graphics using Adobe Illustrator
Gained knowledge in print production and publishing processes
